comment: Induction step for constructing a substitution instance of ~ ax-c15 without using ~ ax-c15 . Quantification case. When ` z ` and ` y ` are distinct, this theorem avoids the dummy variables needed by the more general ~ ax12inda . (Contributed by NM, 24-Jan-2007.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
